content: Btw, you can monitor the stats of the realm at https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/stats. Based on the stats, no bots have been active unfortunately :( (I initially wanted to add a bot that relays messages from/to chat.zulip.org on this stream)
Also, I can bridge all the IRC channels to a stream "IRC" where each channel occupies a topic. The bridge is bi-directional.

@RalfJ I can't deploy it because bots are disabled in this realm though. @nikomatsakis what do you think of opening the floodgates for bots? Alternatively, the script that will be used for the bridge is at https://github.com/rht/python-zulip-api/tree/aio-irc2/zulip/integrations/bridge_with_irc (this is patched from the upstream which doesn't have bi-directional working). I have used it for mirroring #git for months at chat.zulip.org.
